7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Mahdhurah that the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) taught him the Adhan with nineteen phrases and the Iqamah with seventeen phrases, then Abu Mahdhurah counted them as nineteen and seventeen

chapter.eng-name: How Many Phrases Are There In The Adhan?
